participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

dna_saliva_y.Description: Saliva DNA sample collected on site? | 1 = Yes; 0 = Participant refused; 3 = Participant unable to complete; 4 = Not collected (other)

dna_saliva_time_date.Description: Saliva DNA sample date and time collected:

dna_sal_recollect_2.Description: Sample recollect request from RUCDR? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

dna_saliva_recoll_date.Description: Recollected Saliva DNA sample date collected:

dna_sal_recollect_4.Description: Sample recollect request from RUCDR #4? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No [dna_sal_recollect_3] = '1'

dna_saliva_recoll_date_4.Description: Recollected Saliva DNA sample data collected: | [dna_sal_recollect_4] = '1'

dna_saliva_inventory_homekit_2.Description: Saliva DNA Inventory Code #2 (RUCDR barcode on tube) scanned (and home collection kit sent): | [dna_sal_recollect_2] = '1'

dna_sal_recollect_3.Description: Sample recollect request from RUCDR #3? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No [dna_sal_recollect_2] = '1'

dna_saliva_recoll_date_2.Description: Recollected Saliva DNA sample date collected: | [dna_sal_recollect_2] = '1'

dna_saliva_recoll_date_3.Description: Recollected Saliva DNA sample data collected: | [dna_sal_recollect_3] = '1'

dna_saliva_inventory_homekit_4.Description: Saliva DNA Inventory Code #4 (RUCDR barcode on tube) scanned (and home collection kit sent): | [dna_sal_recollect_4] = '1'

dna_saliva_inventory_homekit_3.Description: Saliva DNA Inventory Code #3 (RUCDR barcode on tube) scanned (and home collection kit sent): | [dna_sal_recollect_3] = '1'
